goals.description: Implement @metrics and @logs operators for system monitoring and log management
goals.success_criteria: System metrics can be collected and logs can be analyzed and managed

goals.description: Implement @alerts operator for alerting and notification management
goals.success_criteria: Alerts can be created, managed, and sent based on conditions and thresholds

goals.description: Implement @health operator for system health checks and status monitoring
goals.success_criteria: System health can be monitored and status reports can be generated
